sentences.en: I want something sequacious now and robust.
sentences.cn: 我现在想要前后一贯和健全的东西.

sentences.en: Respecting the audiences doesn't mean being sequacious to the audiences. In fact, the relationship between the interior designers and the popular is dialectical and unitive.
sentences.cn: 对受众的尊重并不意味着对受众的盲从，室内设计师与大众的关系实际上是一种辩证统一的关系。

sentences.en: Teenagers are very sequacious and they often emulate the behavior of their idols who are sometimes negative role models.
sentences.cn: 青少年非常盲从，经常模仿他们偶像的行为，而有些偶像却是负面榜样。

sentences.en: Teenagers are very sequacious and they often emulate the behavior of their idols.
sentences.cn: 青少年非常盲从，经常模仿他们的偶像的行为。

words.tran_cn: 盲从的；合于逻辑的；缺乏独创性的

trans.tran_cn: （推理或推理者）前后一致的，连贯的，<古>盲从的，无独立见解的
